name: Happy Fathers Day
description: Probably the first ever NFT father's day card. One made as a gift for said father, the other editions of 9 are to share the gratitude for all the fathers/mothers. Image is from 40 years ago at NJ when my father was an aspiring scholar and me, the cutest baby that grew up in Japan and came to become an art professional in NY. Can't wait for the pandemic to be over so I can travel and see him in person!
